summary: This document is a telephone call detail record (CDR) from AT&T, produced on August 15, 2019, in response to a query for records from July 6, 2019, to August 11, 2019. It logs hundreds of individual call connections, including originating/terminating numbers, times, durations, and features, likely related to a law enforcement investigation. This document is a detailed AT&T telephone and SMS record query for a specific number (2790840) covering the period from July 6, 2019, to August 11, 2019. It logs numerous calls and text messages, showing a pattern of communication activity in the weeks leading up to Jeffrey Epstein's arrest and death. The records are presented in a technical format with timestamps, durations, and call features. This document is a telecommunications record from AT&T, dated August 15, 2019, showing a query for mobility records from July 6, 2019, to August 11, 2019. It includes a sample call detail record from August 11, 2019, showing an originating and terminating number, but no named individuals are identified in the provided text.

keyFacts: AT&T produced a detailed call log covering a five-week period from July 6 to August 11, 2019.
The document is a law enforcement or investigative record, as indicated by the 'seizure' terminology and proprietary warning.
The call log contains hundreds of entries with timestamps, durations, and technical call features, but no identifiable personal names are present in the provided text.
The record was run/produced on August 15, 2019.
The data is stored in UTC but queried using Eastern Time Zone.
The document is a telephone record for AT&T number 2790840, queried on August 15, 2019.
The records cover a critical period from July 6, 2019, to August 11, 2019, which includes the time of Jeffrey Epstein's arrest on July 6, 2019, and his death on August 10, 2019.
The log contains hundreds of entries detailing voice calls and SMS messages, indicating frequent communication activity.
The records are stored and provided in UTC (Coordinated Universal Time), with the query performed using Eastern Time Zone.
No specific individuals are named in this data chunk; the information is purely technical call detail records.
AT&T was queried for mobility records from July 6, 2019, to August 11, 2019, with the query run on August 15, 2019.
The records are stored and provided in UTC time, but the query used Eastern Time Zone.
A sample call detail record from August 11, 2019, at 15:07:18 shows an originating and terminating telephone number, but the numbers are not disclosed in the provided text.
The document is marked as containing information for authorized persons only and is not for general distribution, indicating its use in a law enforcement or investigative context.
